	team_name VARCHAR(50),
	goals_scored INT,
	assists INT,
	fouls INT
);


CREATE TABLE match_results (
	match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	match_date DATE,
	team_id INT,
	opponent_id INT,
	goals_scored INT,
	goals_conceded INT
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT team_name, SUM(assists) AS total_assists FROM team_performance;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE player_performance (
	p_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	player_name VARCHAR(50),
	goals_scored INT,
	assists INT,
	fouls INT
);


CREATE TABLE team_performance (
	team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	team_name VARCHAR(50),
	goals_scored INT,
	assists INT,
	fouls INT
);


CREATE TABLE match_results (
	match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	match_date DATE,
	team_id INT,
	opponent_id INT,
	goals_scored INT,
	goals_conceded INT
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT player_name, COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM player_performance;

  goals_conceded INT,
  yellow_cards INT,
  red_cards INT
);

CREATE TABLE player_stats (
  player_id INT,
  team_id INT,
  matches_played INT,
  goals_scored INT,
  assists INT,
  fouls_committed INT
);

  match_id INT,
  team_id INT,

  goals_conceded INT,
  yellow_cards INT,
  red_cards INT
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT player_name, assists, fouls FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE fouls > 10 AND goals_scored < 3;
